Title: Establishes a task force to explore the effects of cyber-bullying in New York state and potential measures to address such effects
Summary: Establishes a task force to explore the effects of cyber-bullying in New York state and potential measures to address such effects.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a task force to explore the effects of cyber-bullying in New York state and potential measures to address such effects; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
